info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: **Versatile Developer** with wide ranged experience from developing GUIs to modifying driver code, with some scripting thown in. A keen rock climber with a taste for adventure.

employment.summary: Experienced Developer working on a wide range of embedded and desktop applications

history.summary: Software Developer for [Helitune](http://www.helitune.com)/[Beran Instruments](http://www.beraninstruments.com/) working on customer facing GUIs, internal tools as well as device drivers and micro-controller code. I also assisted in moving from a traditional waterfall pathway to a more agile style one.
highlights: Co-writing a new piece of production test software for a new hardware product and seeing it used on the production line
Creating a soak tester for screening production units at short notice
Helping transition from TFS to Git for version control
Helping to implement suspend to RAM on a Embedded device without OS support

projects.title: Rust embedded Hal for nRF52840
projects.description: Implementation of embedded-hal crate to allow for embedded development on the nordic nRF52840 dev board

projects.title: Peripheral access crate for nRF52850
projects.Description: Create generated from SVD file used to allow pure Rust peripheral access for the nRF52840

interests.name: Rock Climbing
interests.summary: Keen rock climber that has helped teach many people to climb.

interests.name: Photography
interests.summary: Keen amateur photographer with a collection of film cameras.

interests.name: This Resume
interests.summary: This resume is based on a json file stored in a git repository. It is built using travis CI using hack my resume and deployed to an S3 instance. It is then hosted as a static website at jscarrott.com
